amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for Army Corps of Engineers' Flood Control and Coastal Emergencies by $10 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to revise funding levels by reducing the amount made available for "Energy Programs--Fossil Energy Research and Development" and increasing the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Flood Control and Coastal Emergencies", by $10 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Grayson amendment (A065) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A065) offered by Mr. Grayson.
